Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Aimed Focus
Description: In crew combat, Buff yourself with +25% Ranged Accuracy, +25% All Damage, +10% Critical for 3 Turns, Restores (10 + 0 Evasion) Morale

Name: Alert Scanner
Description: Upon entering the orbit of a new system, chance of learning a Rumor

Name: Assisted Care
Description: Reduces the price for medical care at the Doctor by 10% + Doctor Skill

Name: Assisted Installation
Description: Discounts any upgrade of a ship component at the Starport by 10% + Repair Skill

Name: Attentive Overhaul
Description: Automatically passes a failed Repair test in any situation, including wild zone repairs or deep space travel

Name: Aura of Command
Description: Automatically passes a failed Command test in any situation, including deep space travel, mutiny or during a mission

Name: Backline Leader
Description: In crew combat, Buffs entire team with +10% Ranged Accuracy, +10% All Damage, +10% Armor, +25% To Resist Debuffs for 3 Turns

Description: When attempting to access a Black Market, replace a risk card with a Market Access card

Name: Barked Order

Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack causes +20 Bio-Poison Damage, -10% Parry, -10% Dodge for 3 Turns

Description: Buffs Ship with +2 Reactor Pts, +10 Range Change, Self-inflicts +10 Crew Dmg/Turn for next 2 Turns

Name: Overriding Discipline
Description: Buffs Ship with +10% Boarding, +10% Accuracy, +10% Dmg, +10% Defense for next 3 Turns, Purges Ship of any Crippling Ship Effects, Restores Command Skill worth of Morale to 10 Crew

Name: Parting Gift
Description: After a successful Boarding, firing one final shot with deadly accuracy kills an unlucky target; one enemy crew member dies

Name: Perceptive Boss
Description: When paying your crew, your intuition grants a 30% + Command Skill chance to learn hidden Trait from among your crew

Name: Perfected Approach
Description: Faultless tracking of the enemy allows rapid closing. Buffs Ship with +1 Reactor Pts, +5% Shield, +25 Range Change, -10 Escape for next 2 Turns

Name: Perilous Study
Description: When encountering a xeno ship, rapid analysis of the ship's scanner data reveals new findings about the xeno and grants additional Experience reward

Name: Persistent Search
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, increase reward by 10% + Explore Skill

Name: Pinning Shot
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack; successful hit Pins Target and causes -20% Parry, -20% Dodge, -10% Armor for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Plas-Charge Slugs
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Rifle Attack with +20 Plasma, +10% Armor Piercing; successful hit causes -25% Armor, -16 Plasma Shielding for 3 Turns, knocks target back 1 slot
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Plentiful Rewards
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, increase reward by 10% + Explore Skill

Name: Political Hooks
Description: Increase Conflict Score bonus by 10% + Faction Rank when impacting a Conflict through Missions, Spying, Blockade or Patrol

Name: Port Maintenance
Description: Upon landing, automatically repairs damage to 2 to 4 Ship Components equal to 10% up to Repair skill

Name: Power Play
Description: When completing steps in a Mission, increase Faction Reputation bonuses by Charisma %

Name: Precision Action
Description: Purges your Ship of both Crew and Ship Crippling Effects

Name: Quell Mutiny
Description: Powerful words from a strong leader pull the crew together. The mutiny ends and Morale of the entire crew is increased by 10 + Command skill

Name: Raining Steel
Description: When making Initiative Roll in Crew Combat, Buff yourself with +3 Initiative, +15% Ranged Damage, +15% Critical for 3 Turns
Cooldown: Chance to activate at the start of each combat turn

Name: Raking Fire
Description: Softening your target increases the damage of every additional hit. If any ship weapons hit, this Crippling Attack causes -25% Shield, -10% Armor for the next 3 Turns

Name: Rallying Aura
Description: In crew combat, Buffs entire team with +10% All Damage, +10% Critical, +10% Armor for 3 Turns and Restores (10 + 0 Command) Morale

Name: Rallying Cry
Description: Buffs Ship with 20% Protection against Crew and Morale Dmg/Turn for next 2 Turns, Purges your Ship's Crew of any Crippling Effects, Restores Intimidate Skill worth of Morale to 20 Crew

Name: Rapid Fire
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack hits 2 targets causes +16 Bleeding, -10% Deflection for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs 2X Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Rash Courage
Description: In crew combat, Buff yourself with +30% Blade Accuracy, +30% Melee Damage, +10% Armor Piercing, -10% Armor for 4 Turns, advances 1 slot

Name: Reactor Surge
Description: Buffs Ship with +3 Reactor Pts, +20% Accuracy, Self-inflicts +10 Component Dmg/Turn, Self-inflicts +10 Crew Dmg/Turn for next 1 Turns

Name: Read Charts
Description: Automatically passes a failed Navigation test in any situation, including hyperwarp jumps or deep space travel

Name: Recruiter's Eye
Description: When Recruiting, discover one Trait from a new crew member. Your newly hired Recruit gains improved Attributes

Name: Red Badge
Description: When completing steps in a Mission and bearing an Edict of the sponsoring Faction, your fearsome prestige reduces your Reputation loss by up to Intimidate Skill

Name: Reduced Exposure
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, remove a risk card

Name: Regimented Order
Description: Buffs Ship with 40% Protection against Crew Dmg for next 2 Turns, Purges your Ship's Crew of any Crippling Effects

Name: Relaxing Leave
Description: When passing the Spice plate in the Hall, grant all other revelers a Morale bonus equal to 30% of your Charisma

Name: Reliable Hand
Description: Increases your payment for every step in a Mission by 10% + Intimidate Skill

Name: Resolute Hound
Description: In crew combat, Removes all Debuffs; Buff yourself with +25% Armor for 3 Turns, Heals (5 + 0 Intimidate) HP and Morale

Name: Resolute Hunter
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, replace a risk card with an Artifacts reward card

Name: Retribution Justice
Description: Increase Conflict Score bonus by 10% + Faction Rank when impacting a Conflict through Missions, Spying, Blockade or Patrol

Name: Righteous Profits
Description: When executing a trade at the Exchange worth over $5,000, barters for better price by 10% + Negotiate Skill

Name: Righteous Rank
Description: Price for military Rank is discounted by 10% + Command Skill

Name: Rigorous Search
Description: A pirate's keen sense for treasure sniffs out secret hideaways from defeated Smugglers; new lootable cargo is added

Name: Roaring Barrels
Description: In crew combat, Rifle Attack with +25% Ranged Damage, +20% Armor Piercing and removes all Buffs from target
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Rough Interrogation
Description: Upon victory in ship combat, thoroughly questioning the enemy crew creates up to your Intimidate Skill in Intel Records but causes further Rep loss

Name: Rushed Patches
Description: Purges Ship of any Crippling Ship Effects, Repairs 10% Dmg to Ship Components

Name: Safety Protocols
Description: Automatically passes a failed Ship Ops test in any situation, including deep space travel, landing, or hyperwarp jumps

Name: Scattershot
Description: If any ship weapons hit, this Crippling Attack causes -10% Armor, -25 Range Change, -10 Escape for the next 3 Turns

Name: Scorn
Description: In crew combat, intimidating command hits 2 targets causes -4 Initiative, -25% Deflection for 2 Turns

Name: Scouring Search
Description: When Spying in the orbit of a system, replace a risk card with an Intel Records reward card.

Name: Scout's Intuition
Description: Automatically passes a failed Explore test in any situation; including Exploration or during a mission

Name: Second Shadow
Description: Watching crew like a hawk, saves a life during ship combat, blockade, spying, patrol or black market. Crew member is restored to HP equal to Command Skill + 3 x Medical Rating of onboard medical components

Name: Secrets Unbound
Description: Upon landing in an Urban Zone, 10% + Electronics Skill chance to gather Intel Records about the local Faction

Name: Settlement
Description: Automatically passes a failed Negotiate test in any situation; including deep space travel, mutiny or during a mission

Name: Shadowed Fire
Description: In crew combat, Pistol Attack with +25% Ranged Damage, +25% Armor Piercing, +25% Critical; Requires Stealth Mode to use
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Sharp Counter
Description: In crew combat, Blade Attack. Successful attack Buffs yourself with +25% Parry, +10% Armor, Counter-attacks enemy attacker in front 2 rows, 50% chance to end after each counter for 3 Turns
Cooldown: Costs 1.5X Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Sharp Steering
Description: Buffs Ship with +15 Range Change, +10 Escape for next 3 Turns

Name: Shredding Shots
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Rifle Attack causes +20 Bleeding, -20% Deflection for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Shrewd Dealings
Description: When accepting a Mission, gain a (Charisma + Command %) chance to discover one of your Contact's hidden Traits

Name: Signature Homing
Description: Closing in and locking on makes it hard to dodge your fire. If any ship weapons hit, this Crippling Attack causes -25% Defense, -10% Armor for the next 3 Turns

Name: Signature Jammer
Description: Masks ship's signal to prevent identification. When ending a ship encounter in a draw, reduce possible Reputation damage by up to Electronics Skill

Name: Silver Tongue
Description: Price for military Rank is discounted by 10% + Negotiate Skill

Name: Skewering Thrust
Description: In crew combat, Blade Attack hits 2 targets with +25% Blade Accuracy, -15% Ranged Damage, +10% Melee Damage, +15% Armor Piercing, advances 1 slot
Cooldown: Costs 2X Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Skip Off the Void
Description: Use a short-burst of the hyperwarp drive to 'bounce' a short distance and escape ship combat. Causes 30-70% Damage to the drive, mitigated by entire crew's Navigation Skill and burns Fuel equal to a hyperwarp jump

Name: Slashing Retreat
Description: In crew combat, Blade Attack, retreats 1 slot. Successful attack Buffs yourself with +10% Armor Piercing, +25% Parry, +25% Dodge, +10% Armor for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Slippery Trader
Description: When trading into a Trade Ban or War, reduces the Rep penalty by 30% + double Negotiate Skill

Name: Sly Move
Description: Automatically passes a failed Stealth test in any situation; including exploring, landing or during a mission

Name: Snakebite
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack causes -25% Dodge, -15 Bio-Poison Resist for 3 Turns, knocks target back 1 slot
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Sneak Attack
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack with +10% Ranged Damage, +10% Critical; successful hit 50% Stun target and causes -4 Initiative for 3 Turns; Requires Stealth Mode, ends Stealth Mode on use
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Solace in Battle
Description: Purges your Ship of both Crew and Ship Crippling Effects, Restores Doctor Skill worth of Morale to 20 Crew

Name: Staggering Hit
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Rifle Attack with +50% Armor Piercing, +10% Critical; successful hit causes +28 Bleeding, -20% Deflection for 2 Turns, knocks target back 1 slot; Requires Stealth Mode to use
Cooldown: Costs 1.5X Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Static Talks
Description: When Spying in the orbit of a system, learn a Rumor when scoring a positive result

Name: Steadfast Aim
Description: In crew combat, Rifle Attack. Successful attack Buffs yourself with +25% Ranged Accuracy, +25% Ranged Damage, +20% Armor Piercing for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Steady Hands
Description: Buffs Ship with +20% Defense for next 3 Turns, Purges your Ship's Crew of any Crippling Effects, Restores Command Skill worth of Morale to 10 Crew

Name: Steady Mobility
Description: In crew combat, Rifle Attack. Successful attack Buffs yourself with +25% Ranged Damage, +25% Armor Piercing, +25% Dodge, +25% To Resist Debuffs for 3 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Steely Authority
Description: In crew combat, Buffs 2 targets with +30% Deflection, +10% Armor, +75% To Resist Debuffs for 3 Turns and Restores (10 + 0 Tactics) Morale

Name: Stern Leader
Description: Automatically passes a failed Command test in any situation, including deep space travel, mutiny or during a mission

Name: Stiff Salute
Description: When encountering a Military Officer or Zealot Captain, a respectful military salute automatically ends the encounter with a Draw; Reputation penalties may still apply

Name: Storm Navigator
Description: Astute and careful direction from the helm protects the ship and crew from damage when flying through Radiation Storms (quadrant) and Ion Storms (system)

Name: Storm Shielding
Description: Protects the ship and crew from damage when flying through Radiation Storms (quadrant) and Ion Storms (system) by redirecting and modulating ship shielding

Name: Stormhunter
Description: Careful study of readings and conditions allows Engineer to guide the ship through Radiation Storms (quadrant) and Ion Storms (system) while granting additional Experience reward

Name: Strength of Steel
Description: In crew combat, Buff yourself with +35% Parry, +10% Dodge, +50% To Resist Debuffs for 3 Turns, Heals (5 + 0 Blades) HP and Morale

Name: Strict Search
Description: Military discipline demands a thorough search, which uncovers secret hideaways on ships of defeated Smugglers; new lootable cargo is revealed

Name: Summary Execution
Description: Capital punishment of the lowest Morale mutineer quickly reminds the crew who is in charge. The mutiny ends and Morale of the entire crew is increased by 20 + Intimidate Skill

Name: Suppressing Fire
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Rifle Attack with +25% Ranged Accuracy; successful hit causes -25% All Accuracy for 2 Turns, knocks target back 1 slot
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Supremacy of Firepower
Description: When Patrolling a system, remove a risk card.

Name: Sure Landfall
Description: Lands efficiently on a world, reduces operation time to 1 Turn and Fuel Cost to 1

Name: Sustained Fire
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Rifle Attack causes +12 Bleeding, -25% Armor for 3 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Swift Route
Description: Precision planning and twitch reflexes in Hyperwarp Jump reduces fuel cost by 2 + Navigation Skill

Name: Swift Sweep
Description: When Spying in the orbit of a system, remove a risk card.

Name: System Flush
Description: Purges Ship of any Crippling Ship Effects

Name: Tactical Edge
Description: In crew combat, Buffs with +4 Initiative, +20% All Damage, +10% Armor for 3 Turns, pushes target 1 slot

Name: Talk in the Hall
Description: When passing the Spice plate in the Hall, affable talk uncovers a new Rumor

Name: Talk of Far Worlds
Description: When passing the Spice plate in the Hall, talk of distant worlds grants a 10% + Navigation Skill chance for an introduction to a new Contact

Name: Target Acquired
Description: When making Initiative Roll in Crew Combat, front line enemy suffers unseen threat and -2 Initiative, -25% Dodge, -10% Armor for 3 Turns in addition to (0 + 0 Stealth) Morale Loss; Requires Stealth Mode to use
Cooldown: Chance to activate at the start of each combat turn

Name: Targeting Lock
Description: Once a lock is established, your enemy is less likely to escape. If any ship weapons hit, this Crippling Attack causes -10% Armor, -20 Escape for the next 3 Turns

Name: Terrifying Accuracy
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack and causes +14 Bleeding for 3 Turns
Cooldown: Costs Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Terrifying Extortion
Description: Frighten non-violent merchants into turning over their cargo in return for a promise of being unharmed at cost of Reputation loss

Name: Terror of the Skies
Description: During a Blockade of a system, replace a risk card with a Mission Success reward card.

Name: Thrown Wrench
Description: After a successful Boarding, sabotages components to cause a ripple effect of damage and death; -3 Reactor Pts, +25 Component Dmg/Turn, +10 Crew Dmg/Turn for next 4 Turns

Name: Tireless Pursuit
Description: If any ship weapons hit, this Crippling Attack causes -10% Armor, -40 Escape for the next 3 Turns

Name: Toxin Terror
Description: In crew combat, bio-threat hits 2 targets causes -2 Initiative, -10 Bio-Poison Resist for 3 Turns

Name: Trader's Reciprocity
Description: When executing a trade at the Exchange worth over $5,000, gain Reputation equal to your Trade Permit Rank with all local known Contacts

Name: Treat Wounded
Description: Heals 3 crew, or up to (Medical Rating x 3) on ships with advanced medical facilities. Each patient gains 20 + Doctor Skill in HP

Name: Tricky Gunplay
Description: In crew combat, Crippling Pistol Attack causes -6 Initiative, +6 Bleeding, -20% Deflection for 2 Turns
Cooldown: Costs 2X Weapon's Initiative to use (No Valid Weapon)

Name: Twitch Surge
Description: Guarantees successful movement to closer range; 10% + Quickness chance to advance 2 positions

Name: Twitchy Trigger
Description: When Blockading a system, remove a risk card.

Name: Unauthorized Access
Description: After a successful Boarding, breaking into the enemy ship's data banks; steals up to Electronics Skill in Intel Records

Name: Unbending Law
Description: When landing in a zone, the highest level crew member who attempts to abandon the ship reconsiders, but their salary increases by $2

Name: Underworld Renown
Description: When attempting to access a Black Market, replace a risk card with a Market Access card with Contact Influence bonus

Name: Unfaltering Ire
Description: In crew combat, intimidating command hits 2 targets, removes all Buffs and causes -25% All Accuracy, -25% All Damage for 3 Turns

Name: Unforeseen Discovery
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, replace a risk card with a Experience bonus card

Name: Unlawful Loot
Description: When attempting to access a Black Market, reroll a risk card

Name: Unlawful Royalty
Description: When executing a trade at the Black Market worth over $50,000, gain a 50% + Charisma chance to learn about a Smuggler or Smuggler Prince Contact

Name: Unrivaled Patch
Description: Purges Ship of any Crippling Ship Effects, Repairs 20% Dmg to Ship Components

Name: Unseen Fear
Description: Threat of a hidden sniper sows terror among those in the open. unseen threat hits 2 targets and Pins Target and causes -2 Initiative, -25% Dodge for 2 Turns in addition to (15 + 0 Stealth) Morale Loss

Name: Unseen Traces
Description: When landing in a Wild Zone, 10% + Explore Skill chance of discovering traces of a Contact who has operatives working in the area

Name: Unstoppable Force
Description: In crew combat, Buff yourself with +25% Armor, +75% To Resist Debuffs for 3 Turns, Restores (10 + 0 Intimidate) Morale

Name: Unwavering Attention
Description: Automatically passes a failed Intimidate test in any situation, including deep space travel, mutiny, or during a mission

Name: Upstaged Success
Description: Increase Contact Reputation and Influence bonuses when completing a Mission by Charisma %

Name: Vaccination Watch
Description: In crew combat, Buffs entire team with +10% Armor, +36 Bio-Poison Resist for 3 Turns

Name: Vanishing Act
Description: In crew combat, Buff yourself with +2 Initiative, +10% Armor Piercing, +25% Dodge, +15% Armor, Engages Stealth Mode, +(10% + Stealth) Critical; lasts for 2 Turns, retreats 1 slot

Name: Veteran Clarity
Description: Buffs Ship with +10% Critical, 10% Protection against Morale Dmg for next 2 Turns, Purges your Ship's Crew of any Crippling Effects

Name: Vigilant Scanners
Description: Buffs Ship with +25% Accuracy, +25% Defense for next 2 Turns

Name: Vigilant Search
Description: While Exploring a Wild Zone, reroll any card

Name: Voice of Reason
Description: A ship's crew loves a good doctor, and a calm voice of reason can calm angry minds. The mutiny ends and Morale of entire crew is increased by 10 + Doctor skill

Name: Warfare Patch
Description: In the aftermath of a ship battle, repair damage to multiple Ship Components equal to 10% + Repair Skill

Name: Warm Invitation
Description: Receive a [10 + Negotiate]% discount on price of Contact Introductions

Name: Watchful Eye
Description: Automatically passes a failed Ship Ops test in any situation, including deep space travel, landing, or hyperwarp jumps

Name: Welcoming Conscription
Description: When conscripting enemy to serve in your crew after a ship victory, new crew member starts with higher Morale and do not gain new negative Traits

Name: Wide Sweep
Description: When Spying in the orbit of a system, reroll a card.

Name: Winning Compromise
Description: Increases your payment for every step in a Mission by 10% + Negotiate Skill

Name: Wise Counsel
Description: Automatically passes a failed Negotiate test in any situation; including deep space travel, mutiny or during a mission

Name: Word in the Market
Description: When gaining access to the Black Market, you may learn about a Rumor through illicit whispers.
